Name: Craft city
About the game: Sandbox game. Build, destroy, have fun. Create huge buildings. Create huge worlds. Several types of blocks are available: 1.brick 2.concrete 3.tree 4.metal A large number of materials for construction. (foundation, walls, doors, combination locks, windows, doors) There is also a bed, combination locks on the door, lamps.
